results.title: The Athletes
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “A Man and His Sport”.
The growth of track and field competition in Australia is studied, junior events as well as international competitions. We see the work being done to encourage youngsters to participate in track and field events. The film contains some excellent slow motion sequences of athletes performing at their peak, which evoke a strange sort of fluid beauty in this otherwise rather harsh world of sweat and strain.

results.title: A Japanese Fairy Tale
results.media_note: Sorry, we don't have images or video for this item.

results.title: The Moonbeam princess
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “A Japanese Fairy Tale”.
A charming Japanese fairytale about a little princess who came to earth on a moonbeam. Three princes who seek her hand in marriage go in search of three rare and precious gifts to give her. Animated puppet figures in beautiful authentic costumes and background settings give a delightful artistic flavour to this original story.

results.title: Pot luck
results.creator_credit: Ossie Emery, Betti Wood and Pilgrim Films
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “A Fisherman’s World”.
An unplanned fishing trip, looking for likely fishing spots and taking pot luck. Fish caught include flathead, small baitfish and jewfish.

results.title: The Rockhoppers
results.creator_credit: Ossie Emery, Betti Wood and Pilgrim Films
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “A Fisherman’s World”.
Ron Calcutt discusses the do’s and dont’s of rock fishing for blackfish along the coast of Australia. He points out the need for special care in this exciting sport due to the unpredictable weather and tidal conditions, which cause many people to lose their lives by drowning.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Ossie Emery, Betti Wood and Pilgrim Films

results.title: Fishing the lake country
results.creator_credit: Ossie Emery, Betti Wood, Australian Broadcasting Commission and Pilgrim Films
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “A Fisherman’s World”.
Ron Calcutt shows some attractive fishing spots in Sydney and Mallacoota before going to the Gippsland Lakes. All through the film he gives hints on fishing, as well as discussing the ups and downs of the sport.
